summary: A co-ed group of Special Forces agents search the wilderness for a predator type creature that has been on a killing spree.
cast: Jackie Debatin|Eric Etebari|Jonathon Klein|Robert Miano|Timothy V. Murphy|Maurice Nehru|Lisa Rodriguez|David E. Ornston|Carlos Rodriguez|Michael Rooker|Bill M. Ryusaki|Paul Sampson|Sarah Ann Schultz|Booboo Stewart|Maegan Stewart|Nils Allen Stewart|Renee Steward|Noa Tishby|Joey Travolta|Jerry Trimble|Dominiquie Vandenberg|Casper Van Dien|Natalie Alexander|Carlos Buti|Philip Hersh|Paul Dion Monte|Andrew Stubblefield|Ernesto Trinidad|Mike Wike
title: Skeleton
